name: A-GIRL
description:
Game Features


  • In the game, you'll be able to choose your protagonist from a variety of adorable female characters. Each character comes with unique combat skills and attributes, including normal attacks, passive abilities, and ultimate skills, offering you a wide range of choices.

  • Through battles, you can acquire rare sapphires. You can use them to train your favorite characters and upgrade powerful gems, enhancing your characters' strength in the game.

  • The game's combat isn't just about facing off against enemies; it also involves collecting various fruits and gems. These items grant your characters various effects, such as restoring health, increasing movement speed, and generating defensive barriers.

  • Multiple maps to challenge different enemies!

  • You have the option to remove characters' clothing.
